entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Merritt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:41 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Merritt 08:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 6.9°C
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: ENE 18 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level 1300 metres. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 06:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 06:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 06:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
